Once seated our waitress was GREAT! she was patient with our large party and offered great suggestions for apps and drinks. Once the food came we all were pleased. We did a table share and were all pleased with our choices. I am a whiskey drinking so the craft cocktails were on point!

I can't wait to go back and try this place for dinner. It is a good place for a date as well as girls night out!

Oh and how can I forget this, The music was FABULOUS!

This place is a hidden gem in River North. Lying mostly underground, the Franklin Room was an intimate and tasty experience, I'd definitely recommend it for a date, dinner or just drinks.

To start off, they have a phenomenal happy hour. Unlimited $1 oysters! We got 12, and if you ask my boyfriend, should've gotten 12 more. They were so fresh, served with lemon ice and a spicy chili sauce, really kicks the appetite into gear- which is perfect considering that the rest of the menu is also amazing. To top off the awesome oysters you'll have for happy hour, this place has pages upon pages of whisky along with a solid list of cocktails, which the waiters were very knowledgeable about.

To eat we had the smokehouse burger and the squid ink pasta. The burger was juicy, cooked to perfection and oh so flavorful. The pesto squid ink pasta was unexpectedly light and fresh! The pesto sauce was thick but really complemented the sea food in the pasta perfectly.

Price wise, this place is a solid middle ground. Not expensive but definitely not cheap. Most importantly, totally worth it!

And the award goes to...

Trendiest plating job: that deconstructed banana split dessert on a chilled platter!  So pretty and so healthy (bananas AND strawberries, hello!).

Highlight of the meal: the rich, creamy parmesan black rice mushroom risotto!  I added lobster, which was a great decision.  Note that you will get 5-6 bites of lobster for $12.

Most forgettable dish: the brussel sprouts side.  Just kind of boiled and bland.

Biggest service surprise: the waitress automatically split our checks for our party of 7!  Nice!

Most pleasant bargain: $1 oysters were available from 5-6:30pm!

Most misleading menu offering: the cauliflower tots.  We were expecting shredded cauliflower (or a blend of shredded cauli and potato) fried into the traditional cylindrical tot shape, but these were just like cauliflower tempura.  The little heads were lightly battered and fried.  Tasty, but not necessarily tot-like.

Shameless plug: Spot Hero, for having $10 multi-hour parking spaces available in the lot across the street!

For the price point and overall quality and taste of food, this one'll have to be 3 instead of 4 stars.

Never had a bad experience, good food, good drink, nice environment. Most recently I placed an Uber Eats order and the driver forgot two items. I called the restaurant and they handled it without hesitation.

We had a fantastic meal at The Franklin Room! The place is small and has a sexy speak easy feel to it. Our arrival during their daily happy hour meant we could enjoy the $5 sparkling wine along with the most delicious $1 oysters...the oysters were perfection! The steak frites were cooked exactly as ordered and had excellent flavor. Will definitely return when in Chicago!

Update: Shortly after posting my review, the manager called me offering a gift card to come back again and show me an improved experience.  I lost his number, so didn't take advantage of that amazing offer, but I think that shows some awesome customer service and I think The Franklin Room deserves another star for that.

What's not to like here. Nice atmosphere with a great happy hour deal on oysters. These $1 oysters aren't your typical HH, they come dressed to perfection.
Drinks are great here as well. A++ job by the bartenders.
We tried the cauliflower tots and the mussels as well and wow I have to say I was blown away. Wasn't expecting much but these were phenomenal. Portion size is great too.
Will definitely be back for happy hour and apps but after that stellar first experience I'm more looking forward to trying them for dinner!
I ordered through Uber eats. A burger with side salad and cheese curds. I received fries instead of the salad and a TINY order of cheese curds.

pics.caption: This was my $7 order of cheese curds!

review.des: Came here for happy hour oysters based on a recommendation from a friend and they didn't disappoint. Franklin Room is a casual, dim-lit space that's in the basement. Tables are close together, so not one of those romantic date places. Oysters were great, they were fresh and tasty! I honestly don't remember what else I ordered, but I had a great time and look forward to coming back.

I am at a loss for words. This place is nothing short of amazing. Started out the cauliflower tater tot's which was heaven in the mouth. Then we decided to split the king crab dip as well as the surf and turf burger. Im not a beef burger person, but omg. This was amazing. I highly recommend. The staff was also great. The lunch specials look great soooo we will be back.
